reviewText: I didn't even know this existed until I was looking for DVDs of the TV series on Amazon. Glad to have it.
This "short" was almost as entertaining as the movie itself.  I'm glad I finally bought it.
movie too short.... not worth the money
Great addition to the original. My kids love it.
Adorable movie!  We love the Monsters vs. Aliens movie and this a perfect for showing at Halloween.
